title: 15 Nordstrom Fashion Bestsellers - Including Half Yearly Deals up to 40 Percent Off

Check out the best Nordstrom clothes and accessories that customers are currently loving from the retailer ahead, and buy them before they're gone.

As shopping editors, we know all of the most useful secrets when it comes to searching through Nordstrom's site for the best styles (and even better deals). It's our job to track down great products with high ratings, and Nordstrom has no shortage of those. With its half yearly sale in full swing, it's also the perfect time to grab some of Nordstrom's most popular styles at unbeatable prices.

If you find yourself in the market to update your closet with a new clothing item or even a top-rated pair of shoes, we have more than a few suggestions. We've curated products that are not only trending, but included in our own personal favorites as well, with many being highly discounted. Below, we've laid them all out for you — because, after all, what are shopping fairy godmothers for?

Nordstrom recently released tons of new wardrobe essentials to their sale section that are sure to sell out quickly, plus a few cult-favorite pieces that are hard enough to find in stock. From a top-rated swimsuit to stylish jeans and editor-loved sunglasses, these pieces are designed to live in your closet for the longterm — even as they endure multiple trend changes and TikTok aesthetics.

Check out the best Nordstrom clothes and accessories that customers are currently loving from the retailer ahead, and buy them before they're gone.

Best Tie-Front Top

WAYF Tabitha Tie Front Woven Shirt ($36, originally $55)

This tie-front top couldn't be more on trend or perfect for a hot summer day. Made from breezy cotton with just a hint of elastane, it's equally comfortable and cute. Pair it with matching shorts or mix and match with your favorite pair of denim.

Best Workout Leggings

Zella Live In High Waist Leggings ($38-$59, originally $59)

Ready to jump back on the fitness bandwagon? You'll feel even more empowered to kickstart your athletic goals with the help of a great pair of leggings — just like these best-selling Zella leggings from Nordstrom. The high, slip-proof waistband includes a pocket. Whether you're going for a run or just running errands, these leggings will ensure you do it comfortably.

Best Sunglasses

Aire Whirlpool 53mm Aviator Sunglasses ($39)

If you've been searching for the perfect pair of vintage-inspired aviator sunglasses, the search is over — at least according to our editor, that is. She tested out this tortoiseshell pair and rated it five stars for its shape, soft lens tint, and subtle pattern. Read more about why she loves these sunglasses in this Aire Whirlpool 53mm Aviator Sunglasses review.

Editor Quote: "I've tried on pairs of aviator sunglasses under $20 that definitely looked their price — I blame the high-gloss shine of the plastic, the thin frames, and the all-wrong lens shapes — but these look much more expensive than they are. When people compliment them, I'm almost giddy to share the price. At less than $40, I honestly consider them a steal." — Angela Elias, contributing editor, Shopping

Best Linen Pants

Caslon Tapered Linen Pants ($42, originally $60)

If you've been on the hunt for a pair of linen pants, you'll want to snag these immediately. Currently 30 percent off, they're a popular option that has the cutest tapered hem and an easy drawstring waist for extra comfort.

Best Tank Dress

Stretch Cotton Ribbed Tank Dress ($56, originally $80)

Comfortable and casual, this ribbed tank dress is being offered for an unbeatable price and ideal for days when you want to look polished without trying too hard. Slip into a pair of sandals and sling on a tote bag for a classic summer look.

Best Open-Knit Tank Top

Sanctuary Open Stitch Sleeveless Cotton Sweater ($69)

For an elevated tank top that you can dress up or down, this open-weave, sleeveless sweater is a perfect fit. Throw it over a nude cami and pair it with everything from trousers and skirts to jeans and shorts. It also comes in a vibrant shade of green if you're craving more color.

Best Bathing Suit

Andie The Amalfi One-Piece Swimsuit ($112-$128)

This Andie one-piece swimsuit is giving '90s Baywatch in the best way with its minimal yet undeniably flattering cut and bold shade. If red isn't your color, it comes in five other hues, including two patterns. With a 4.4 rating and over 800 reviews, it's a solidly popular choice. It runs slightly small so you might want to consider sizing up.

Best Dress

Farm Rio Delicate Flowers Cotton Minidress ($130, originally $200)

Boldly colorful with a mesmerizing print and eye-catching details, this cotton minidress is pure fun. Pack it for your next warm weather vacation or just throw it on to feel like you're out of office. At 35 percent off, it's a deal either way.

Best Wide-Leg Jeans

Emmett Patch Pocket Wide Leg Jeans ($138)

Wide-leg denim is everywhere right now, but it's hard to find a pair that's flattering, comfortable, and classic enough to last. This Madewell style features retro-inspired front patch pockets, a high, stretchy waist, and a wide leg that manages to meet the trend without looking sloppy. Our editor tested them out and gives her honest opinion in this Madewell Emmett Patch Pocket Wide Leg Jeans review.

Editor Quote: "The material is mostly cotton with a smidge of recycled polyester and elastane, so they feel especially soft and stretchy. The top of the jeans hit just above my belly button and almost feel like shapewear. As a mom of two, I prefer high-waisted jeans that offer plenty of belly support without feeling like I'm counting down the minutes until I can unbutton them. They mold to my curves and I can squat, bend over, and run around all day without the dreaded droopiness that sometimes happens towards the end of the day." — Angela Elias, contributing editor, Shopping

Best Barrel-Leg Jeans

Madewell The Darted Barrel Leg Jeans ($148)

If you've been searching for a subtle pair of barrel leg jeans that aren't too voluminous, Madewell's The Darted Barrel Leg Jeans could be the perfect option. The jeans feature darts that are angled to enhance the curve-shape without needing to exaggerate the volume. Our editor tested them out and shares her thoughts in this Madewell The Darted Barrel Leg Jeans review.

Editor Quote: "These jeans have a fitted waist, bow out around the middle of the leg, and have a tapered ankle. While there's enough mid-leg volume to capture the barrel leg look, it isn't as exaggerated as Free People's version, or a lot of others on the market. To help emphasize the curved leg shape, this pair has darts at the knees to create a sort of optical illusion, instead of tacking on more volume. The result is subtle and surprisingly flattering." — Angela Elias, contributing editor, Shopping

Best Denim Cut-Off Shorts

Agolde Parker Long Shorts ($148)

Every summer capsule wardrobe needs a solid pair of raw-hem denim shorts, and this vintage-inspired option from Agolde is the gold standard. Made from premium, non-stretch denim with a high waist, relaxed fit, and subtle distressing, it's a classic piece you'll reach for all season.

Best Sneakers

Veja Campo Sneaker ($160)

For a French girl twist on a sporty look, you can't go wrong with a pair of Veja sneakers. Their clean look is accented with a bold and colorful "V" and they look equally chic with jeans and dresses. You can grab them in eight different colors, but we love the fresh pop of Kelly green.

Best Low-Heeled Sandals

Jeffrey Campbell Adapt Ankle Strap Sandal ($165)

For easy, low heels that will instantly dress up everything from linen shorts to jeans, these suede sandals from Jeffrey Campbell are a hot commodity. They come in five colors that range from creamy neutrals to pretty pastels.

Best Leather Tote Bag

Madewell Handwoven Leather Tote ($198)

It's hard to believe that this handwoven leather tote is less than $200, considering you can easily haul a laptop and any other on-the-go items for work commutes or traveling. The interior zipper pocket helps to keep smaller valuables like keys and cash organized and accessible. You can choose between five colors.

— Additional reporting by Angela Elias and Balim Tezel

Kyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer and editor with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She previously worked as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. Before joining PS, Kyley worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.

Angela Elias (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping, where she reviews everything from beauty products to kitchen gadgets, curates can't-miss sales, and creates "best of" shopping roundups. In her former roles at PS, she led the relaunch of its Latine identity and family-focused verticals, directed its Home vertical, and hosted shopping segments. She has nearly 15 years of experience working in the lifestyle space as a writer, editor, content strategist, director, on-camera talent, and publicist.

Balim Tezel (she/her) is a shopping updates editor at PS and the founder of Maison des Nus, a New York-based affordable luxury brand. She graduated from Northwestern University's Medill School of Journalism.
